wordGroup: sojourn time 逗留时间，滞留时间

sentences.en: Woe is me, that I sojourn in Mesech, that I dwell in the tents of Kedar!
sentences.cn: 我寄居在米设，住在基达帐棚之中，有祸了。

sentences.en: What incredible damage did she do to America during her brief sojourn there?
sentences.cn: 在短期逗留期间内，她对美国造成了怎样令人难以置信的伤害？

sentences.en: Five years' sojourn between these four walls and of disappearance had necessarily destroyed or dispersed the elements of fear.
sentences.cn: 他在那四堵墙里，销声匿迹，住了五年，这已够清除或驱散那些可虑的因素了。
